54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Thauban reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said. Verily, Allah drew the ends of the world near me until I saw its east and west, and He bestowed upon me two treasures, the red and the white. The rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلاَكُ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ بَعْضِهِمْ بِبَعْضٍ
chapter.eng-name: (Parts of) This Ummah Will Destroy One Another
